بِسْمِ اللهِ الرَّحْمٰنِ الرَّحِيْمِ

When I first fall in love with you, I questioned myself through and through, where have you been all these while. And i realized, had i met you any earlier or later in life, we won’t be where we are today. And for that I’m forever bounded my life to you.
- LR
